name: Chickpea Rice Pulao with Veggies and Pulao/Biryani Masala
description: Chickpea Rice Pulao with Pulao/Biryani Masala. Easy One Pot meal w/ chickpeas, basmati rice and vegetables. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Nut-free Recipe. Can be made oil-free
recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp black peppercorns (use 1/3 tsp for less heat)
1.5 tbsp pulao/biryani masala home made (above or store bought)
1 cup small chopped assorted vegetables ( like chopped carrots, green beans, cauliflower etc.)
15 oz can chickpeas  (or 1.5 cups cooked or use other beans of choice)
cilantro, mint, lemon juice for garnish

itemListElement.text: In a small skillet, dry roast all the whole spices through cloves over medium-low heat until they get fragrant and coriander seeds change color. (do not brown). Stir occasionally. This will take 1 to 3 minutes . Cool, transfer to a spice grinder and grind with the cinnamon and nutmeg. Keep aside or store in an airtight container. makes about 3 Tablespoons, half of which will be used for the pulao.
itemListElement.name: In a small skillet, dry roast all the whole spices through cloves over medium-low heat until they get fragrant and coriander seeds change color. (do not brown). Stir occasionally. This will take 1 to 3 minutes . Cool, transfer to a spice grinder and grind with the cinnamon and nutmeg. Keep aside or store in an airtight container. makes about 3 Tablespoons, half of which will be used for the pulao.

itemListElement.text: Soak the basmati rice in water for about 15 minutes (the next few steps take that much time, so no planning needed).
itemListElement.name: Soak the basmati rice in water for about 15 minutes (the next few steps take that much time, so no planning needed).

itemListElement.text: Heat oil in a pressure cooker over medium heat (IP on saute). Add cumin seeds and cook for a minute or until fragrant.
itemListElement.name: Heat oil in a pressure cooker over medium heat (IP on saute). Add cumin seeds and cook for a minute or until fragrant.

itemListElement.text: Add onions, a generous pinch of salt and a generous pinch of sugar and cook until golden. 5 to 7 minutes. Add ginger, garlic, turmeric, cayenne, pulao masala and mix well. Cook for few seconds or until very fragrant. Add tomatoes and a tbsp of water and cook until the tomatoes are saucy. Mash the larger pieces. about 5 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Add onions, a generous pinch of salt and a generous pinch of sugar and cook until golden. 5 to 7 minutes. Add ginger, garlic, turmeric, cayenne, pulao masala and mix well. Cook for few seconds or until very fragrant. Add tomatoes and a tbsp of water and cook until the tomatoes are saucy. Mash the larger pieces. about 5 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Add the vegetables, chickpeas and salt and mix well. Cook for a minute.
itemListElement.name: Add the vegetables, chickpeas and salt and mix well. Cook for a minute.

itemListElement.text: Drain the rice, add to the pressure cooker. Add scant 1.5 cups of water and mix well. Close the lid and cook for 1 to 3 minute on Manual in Instant Pot (or cook for 1 whistle) - Depends on the type/brand of rice.
itemListElement.name: Drain the rice, add to the pressure cooker. Add scant 1.5 cups of water and mix well. Close the lid and cook for 1 to 3 minute on Manual in Instant Pot (or cook for 1 whistle) - Depends on the type/brand of rice.

itemListElement.text: Let the pressure release naturally. Add a dash of lemon juice and fluff. Taste and adjust salt if needed and mix. Garnish with cilantro and chopped mint. Serve with non dairy yogurt, raita, pickle or mango/mango salsa
itemListElement.name: Let the pressure release naturally. Add a dash of lemon juice and fluff. Taste and adjust salt if needed and mix. Garnish with cilantro and chopped mint. Serve with non dairy yogurt, raita, pickle or mango/mango salsa
